entry.title: Friday: Periods of light snow. High minus 9.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending early this afternoon then clearing. Fog patches dissipating early this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 9. Wind chill near minus 20. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Friday 30 December 2022

entry.title: Friday night: A few clouds. Low minus 16.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Fog patches developing overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 16. Wind chill minus 17 this evening and minus 22 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Friday 30 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 7.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness in the afternoon. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 22 in the morning and minus 12 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Friday 30 December 2022
